entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 40%
